mapper.insert: insert into question (question, type, edit_flag, bank_id) values(#{question}, #{type}, #{editFlag}, #{bankId})
insert into choice(text, question_id, is_right) values(#{text}, #{questionId}, #{right})
mapper.select: select id, question,type, edit_flag, bank_id from question where bank_id = #{bankId} and id > #{id} order by id asc limit 1

select id, question, type, edit_flag, bank_id from question where id in (select question_id from wrong_collection where user_id = #{userId} and bank_id = #{bankId}) and id > #{lastId} order by id asc limit 1

select t1.id, question, type, edit_flag, bank_id from question t1 join (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * ((SELECT MAX(id) FROM question where bank_id = #{bankId})- (SELECT MIN(id) FROM question where bank_id = #{bankId}))+ (SELECT MIN(id) FROM question where bank_id = #{bankId})) AS id) AS t2 where t1.id >= t2.id and t1.bank_id = #{bankId} ORDER BY t1.id LIMIT 1;
select id, question, type, edit_flag, bank_id from question where id = #{id}
select id, text, question_id, is_right from choice where id = #{id}
select count(*) from question where bank_id = #{bankId} and type=#{type}
select id, text, question_id, is_right from choice where question_id = #{id} and is_right=1
select id, text, question_id, is_right from choice where question_id = #{id} and is_right=0
mapper.delete: delete from choice where question_id in(select id from question where bank_id = #{bankId})
mapper.select: select id from question where bank_id = #{bankId} and type=#{type}
select b.id, b.question, b.type, b.edit_flag, b.bank_id from paper_question a left join question b on a.question_id = b.id where a.paper_id = #{paperId} and b.type = #{type}
